title: Comming Soon
description: A responsive 'Coming Soon' landing page for my main website. It uses media queries to adapt seamlessly across screen sizes, and visually signals that a larger project is in development.

title: Back to Top
description: A simple and functional webpage with a sticky arrow button that appears as you scroll down. Clicking it takes the user smoothly back to the top, enhancing user experience for long pages.

title: Site layout
description: Two fully responsive web pages created using CSS Grid and Flexbox. This project demonstrates a solid understanding of modern layout systems for clean, structured UI designs.

title: Currency Exchange
description: A currency conversion app where users can input an amount and convert between selected currencies. It fetches real-time exchange rates and displays accurate results dynamically.

title: Random Name Generator
description: This app helps users decide who pays the bill or performs a task by generating a random name from a list. It's a fun and practical tool built with dynamic input handling.

title: Tip Calculator
description: An interactive calculator that helps users quickly determine the right tip amount based on the bill value and desired percentage. It also supports custom tip values.

title: Multilevel Menu
description: A responsive multilevel dropdown menu that transforms into a hamburger-style navigation on smaller screens. Ideal for scalable site navigation structures.

title: School Management
description: A web application built in Angular that supports authentication for three different user roles: Admin, Teacher, and Student. Each role has its own dedicated dashboard and features. The application uses NgRx for state management, ensuring efficient data flow and scalability.

title: Base Project
description: A basic Angular app where users can select a country from a dropdown, which dynamically loads a list of cities. It includes a login page that grants access to additional features or routes once authenticated.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: A Pomodoro-style timer that helps users focus using the 25/5-minute technique. It includes local notifications, an activity history tracker, and smooth transitions between work and break sessions.

title: Christmas Project
description: An interactive Angular project with a festive theme. Users can adjust the number of snowflakes on the screen and enable background music for a holiday mood. It's fully responsive and designed with dynamic visual elements.
